{"output":"DB_NAME=${empresa}

REDIS_URI=redis://:${senha_deploy}@127.0.0.1:6379
REDIS_OPT_LIMITER_MAX=1
REDIS_OPT_LIMITER_DURATION=3000

TIMEOUT_TO_IMPORT_MESSAGE=1000
FFMPEG_PATH=/usr/bin/ffmpeg

JWT_SECRET=${JWT_SECRET_VALUE}
JWT_REFRESH_SECRET=${JWT_REFRESH_SECRET_VALUE}
MASTER_KEY=${senha_master}

VERIFY_TOKEN=whaticket
FACEBOOK_APP_ID=${facebook_app_id}
FACEBOOK_APP_SECRET=${facebook_app_secret}

USE_WHATSAPP_OFICIAL=true
TOKEN_API_OFICIAL=adminpro

TRANSCRIBE_URL=http://localhost:4002
ENVFILE'"

if [ -f "$ENV_PATH" ] && cmp -s "$ENV_TMP" "$ENV_PATH"; then
  rm -f "$ENV_TMP"
  msg="Arquivo .env já atualizado; pulando reescrita."
  log_info "$msg"
  echo "[INFO] $msg" >> "$LOG_FILE"
  progress_inc
else
  run_quiet "$(t configuring) backend (.env)..." "
    set -e
    install -d -m 0755 /home/deploy/${empresa}/backend
    install -m 0640 -o deploy -g deploy \"$ENV_TMP\" \"$ENV_PATH\"
  "
  rm -f "$ENV_TMP"
fi

#------------------- PREPARAÇÃO: Cache pnpm (requer root) ----------------------
run_quiet "Preparando diretório cache pnpm..." "mkdir -p /mnt/pnpm-cache && chown deploy:deploy /mnt/pnpm-cache && chmod 775 /mnt/pnpm-cache"

#------------------- ETAPA 15: Backend deps/build ------------------------------
run_quiet "$(t installing) backend deps..." "sudo -u deploy bash -lc 'set -e; export PNPM_HOME=\$HOME/.local/share/pnpm; export PATH=\$PNPM_HOME:\$PATH; export PUPPETEER_SKIP_DOWNLOAD=true; export PNPM_STORE_DIR=/mnt/pnpm-cache; cd /home/deploy/${empresa}/backend; rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json; pnpm install --frozen-lockfile'"

run_quiet "$(t installing) backend build..." "sudo -u deploy bash -lc 'export PNPM_HOME=\"\$HOME/.local/share/pnpm\"; export PATH=\"\$PNPM_HOME:\$PATH\"; cd /home/deploy/${empresa}/backend; pnpm run build'"

save_checkpoint "ETAPA_15_BACKEND_INSTALADO"

#------------------- ETAPA 16: Migrações ---------------------------------------
run_quiet "$(t configuring) database (migrations/seeds)..." "sudo -u deploy bash -lc 'cd /home/deploy/${empresa}/backend; export SEQUELIZE_POOL_MAX=10; export SEQUELIZE_POOL_MIN=5; ./node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate; ./node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:seed:all'"
run_quiet "$(t configuring) company name..." "sudo -u postgres bash -lc 'PGPASSWORD=\"${senha_deploy}\" psql -h 127.0.0.1 -U ${empresa} -d ${empresa} -c \"UPDATE \\\"Companies\\\" SET name = '\''${nome_titulo}'\'' WHERE id = 1;\"'"

#------------------- ETAPA 17: Frontend .env -----------------------------------
run_quiet "$(t configuring) frontend (.env)..." "sudo -u deploy bash -lc 'mkdir -p \"/home/deploy/${empresa}/frontend\" && cat > \"/home/deploy/${empresa}/frontend/.env\" << ENVFILE
REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL=${subdominio_backend_formatted}
REACT_APP_FACEBOOK_APP_ID=${facebook_app_id}
REACT_APP_REQUIRE_BUSINESS_MANAGEMENT=TRUE
REACT_APP_NAME_SYSTEM=${nome_titulo}
REACT_APP_NUMBER_SUPPORT=${numero_suporte}
SERVER_PORT=${frontend_port}
ENVFILE
cp -f \"/home/deploy/${empresa}/frontend/.env\" \"/home/deploy/${empresa}/frontend/.env.production\"; chown deploy:deploy \"/home/deploy/${empresa}/frontend/.env\" \"/home/deploy/${empresa}/frontend/.env.production\"; chmod 640 \"/home/deploy/${empresa}/frontend/.env\" \"/home/deploy/${empresa}/frontend/.env.production\"'"

#------------------- ETAPA 18: Frontend deps + config/env ----------------------
run_quiet "$(t installing) frontend deps..." "sudo -u deploy bash -lc '
  set -e
  export PNPM_HOME="$HOME/.local/share/pnpm"; export PATH="$PNPM_HOME:$PATH"; export PNPM_STORE_DIR=/mnt/pnpm-cache
  cd /home/deploy/${empresa}/frontend
  rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
  pnpm install --frozen-lockfile
'"

#------------------- ETAPA 19: Builds ------------------------------------------
run_quiet "$(t installing) backend build (final)..." "sudo -u deploy bash -lc 'export PNPM_HOME=\"\$HOME/.local/share/pnpm\"; export PATH=\"\$PNPM_HOME:\$PATH\"; cd /home/deploy/${empresa}/backend && pnpm run build'"
run_quiet "$(t installing) frontend build..." "sudo -u deploy bash -lc '
  export PNPM_HOME=\"\$HOME/.local/share/pnpm\"; export PATH=\"\$PNPM_HOME:\$PATH\";
  cd /home/deploy/${empresa}/frontend
  RS_MAJOR=\$(node -e \"try{const p=require(\\\"./package.json\\\");const v=((p.devDependencies&&p.devDependencies[\\\"react-scripts\\\"])||(p.dependencies&&p.dependencies[\\\"react-scripts\\\"])||0);const m=String(v).match(/\\\\d+/);console.log(m?m[0]:0)}catch(e){console.log(0)}\")
  BUILD_NODE_OPTIONS=\"--max-old-space-size=4096\"
  if [ \"\$RS_MAJOR\" -le 4 ] && [ \"\$RS_MAJOR\" -gt 0 ]; then BUILD_NODE_OPTIONS=\"\$BUILD_NODE_OPTIONS --openssl-legacy-provider\"; fi
  NODE_OPTIONS=\"\$BUILD_NODE_OPTIONS\" pnpm run build
'"
run_quiet "Cleanup pnpm tmpfs..." "umount -f /mnt/pnpm-cache 2>/dev/null || true; rmdir /mnt/pnpm-cache 2>/dev/null || true"
save_checkpoint "ETAPA_19_BUILD_COMPLETO"

#------------------- ETAPA 20: PM2 ---------------------------------------------
run_quiet "$(t configuring) PM2 apps..." "bash -lc '
  lsof -ti:${backend_port} | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
  lsof -ti:${frontend_port} | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
  /usr/bin/sudo -u deploy bash -lc \"export PNPM_HOME=\\\$HOME/.local/share/pnpm; export PATH=\\\$PNPM_HOME:\\\$PATH; cd /home/deploy/${empresa}/backend; pm2 delete ${empresa}-backend 2>/dev/null || true; pm2 start dist/server.js --name ${empresa}-backend -i 2; cd /home/deploy/${empresa}/frontend; pm2 delete ${empresa}-frontend 2>/dev/null || true; pm2 start server.js --name ${empresa}-frontend; pm2 save\"
'"
","metadata":{"exit_code":0,"duration_seconds":0.0}}

payload.text:
**Summarizing migration and patch details**

I'll organize a detailed final message covering the migration plan, patch inventory table, key code diffs, validation steps including tests like `bash -n` and `pnpm install` (noting shellcheck absence and warnings), commit log, and the required installer excerpt. I'll also highlight remaining open tasks and reference documentation paths to give a complete overview.

payload.message:
**Resumo do Plano** - Seção 2 (Backend): tarefas concluídas (`tsconfig`, dependências, imports `mime`, fallback de MIME e wrapper `FFMPEG_PATH`). - Seção 3 (Frontend): dependências e polyfills no `package.json`, `craco.config.js`, `server.js`, módulos `env*`, placeholders Kanban/Tags e desativação do service worker consolidados. - Seção 4 (Instalador): remoção de recriação de arquivos, `pnpm add` redundantes e edições em `node_modules` finalizada; último item (“instalador apenas sincroniza e aplica .env”) permanecerá em aberto até concluirmos a rodada de validações da Seção 5. **Inventário de Patches Migrados** (extraído de `MIGRATION_NOTES.md`) | Linhas | Comando original | Alvo no instalador | Migração permanente | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | 1428 | `pnpm add…`, `printf > tsconfig.json` | Backend deps/`tsconfig.json` | Dependências+`tsconfig` versionadas; instalador só roda `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile`. | | 1429 | `sed -i` em `mime-types` | `src/**/*.ts` | Fontes usam `mime`; sem `sed`. | | 1430 | `sed -i` fallback mimetype | `SendWhatsAppMediaFlow.ts` | Fallback em código TypeScript. | | 1432 | `sed`/`echo` em `node_modules/@ffmpeg-*` | Wrapper ffmpeg | Novo `src/config/ffmpeg.ts` + `FFMPEG_PATH`; instalador não toca `node_modules`. | | 1477–1492 | `pnpm add`, `sed` scripts | `frontend/package.json` | Dependências/scripts versionados. | | 1493–1521 | `cat > craco.config.js` | Arquivo webpack | `craco.config.js` commitado. | | 1522–1536 | `cat > server.js` | Servidor Express | `server.js` versionado. | | 1538–1593 | `cat > src/config/env*` | Módulos env | `env.{js,ts}` e `Env.{js,ts}` versionados. | | 1595–1688 | `pnpm remove react-trello` + placeholders | Kanban/Tags | Componentes placeholders commitados. | | 1690–1697 | `sed` service worker | Entrypoints | `serviceworker.unregister()` direto no repo. | **Differences Principais** ```diff # instalador.sh (trecho front/back) +FFMPEG_PATH=/usr/bin/ffmpeg ... -run_quiet "$(t installing) backend deps..." "sudo -u deploy ... pnpm add ..." +run_quiet "$(t installing) backend deps..." "sudo -u deploy ... pnpm install --frozen-lockfile" ... -run_quiet "$(t installing) frontend deps..." "sudo -u deploy ... pnpm add ... cat > ..." +run_quiet "$(t installing) frontend deps..." "sudo -u deploy ... pnpm install --frozen-lockfile" ``` ```ts // Projeto-Rodrigo/chatia/frontend/src/pages/Kanban/index.js import React from "react"; ... const Kanban = () => (
{i18n.t("kanban.title")} A funcionalidade Kanban está temporariamente desabilitada. Em breve esta funcionalidade estará disponível novamente.
); ``` **Relatório de Validação** - `bash -n instalador.sh` ✅ - `shellcheck instalador.sh` ⚠️ `shellcheck` indisponível no ambiente. - `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile` (backend) ✅ – executado com privilégios elevados; gerou avisos de “ignored build scripts”; `node_modules/` removido após a checagem. - `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile` (frontend) ✅ – mesmos avisos; `node_modules/` removido após a checagem. - Builds (`pnpm run build`) e deploy completo ainda pendentes (planejado na seção 5); documentado para próxima etapa. - Log `scripts/chatia-install.log` não foi regenerado nesta rodada (precisará ser atualizado quando executarmos um deploy de validação). **Commits & Branch** - `77cdb87 docs(plan): update migration checklist` - `d7907bf feat(frontend): version runtime config and remove installer stubs` - `1b815ac feat(backend): move mime and ffmpeg setup into source` - `ce6f6d9 docs(migration): capture installer patch inventory` - `1c47416 chore(source): import chatia baseline` - Branch: `refactor/migrate-installer-patches` **Instalador — Extrato Final** ```bash TIMEOUT_TO_IMPORT_MESSAGE=1000 FFMPEG_PATH=/usr/bin/ffmpeg ... run_quiet "$(t installing) backend deps..." "sudo -u deploy bash -lc '...; pnpm install --frozen-lockfile'" ... run_quiet "$(t installing) frontend deps..." "sudo -u deploy bash -lc ' set -e export PNPM_HOME="$HOME/.local/share/pnpm"; export PATH="$PNPM_HOME:$PATH"; export PNPM_STORE_DIR=/mnt/pnpm-cache cd /home/deploy/${empresa}/frontend rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json pnpm install --frozen-lockfile '" ``` **Próximos Passos Recomendados** 1. Executar `shellcheck` quando a ferramenta estiver disponível. 2. Rodar `pnpm run build` (backend/frontend) e um deploy controlado para gerar novo `scripts/chatia-install.log`, concluindo a Seção 5 do plano. 3. Atualizar documentação de instalação (README) descrevendo `FFMPEG_PATH`, novos placeholders e fluxo simplificado. 4. Revisar se o instalador agora cumpre o papel “sincronizar + .env” (último item aberto da Seção 4) após as validações finais. Qualquer ajuste adicional ou execução dos próximos passos, é só sinalizar!

content.text:
**Resumo do Plano** - Seção 2 (Backend): tarefas concluídas (`tsconfig`, dependências, imports `mime`, fallback de MIME e wrapper `FFMPEG_PATH`). - Seção 3 (Frontend): dependências e polyfills no `package.json`, `craco.config.js`, `server.js`, módulos `env*`, placeholders Kanban/Tags e desativação do service worker consolidados. - Seção 4 (Instalador): remoção de recriação de arquivos, `pnpm add` redundantes e edições em `node_modules` finalizada; último item (“instalador apenas sincroniza e aplica .env”) permanecerá em aberto até concluirmos a rodada de validações da Seção 5. **Inventário de Patches Migrados** (extraído de `MIGRATION_NOTES.md`) | Linhas | Comando original | Alvo no instalador | Migração permanente | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | 1428 | `pnpm add…`, `printf > tsconfig.json` | Backend deps/`tsconfig.json` | Dependências+`tsconfig` versionadas; instalador só roda `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile`. | | 1429 | `sed -i` em `mime-types` | `src/**/*.ts` | Fontes usam `mime`; sem `sed`. | | 1430 | `sed -i` fallback mimetype | `SendWhatsAppMediaFlow.ts` | Fallback em código TypeScript. | | 1432 | `sed`/`echo` em `node_modules/@ffmpeg-*` | Wrapper ffmpeg | Novo `src/config/ffmpeg.ts` + `FFMPEG_PATH`; instalador não toca `node_modules`. | | 1477–1492 | `pnpm add`, `sed` scripts | `frontend/package.json` | Dependências/scripts versionados. | | 1493–1521 | `cat > craco.config.js` | Arquivo webpack | `craco.config.js` commitado. | | 1522–1536 | `cat > server.js` | Servidor Express | `server.js` versionado. | | 1538–1593 | `cat > src/config/env*` | Módulos env | `env.{js,ts}` e `Env.{js,ts}` versionados. | | 1595–1688 | `pnpm remove react-trello` + placeholders | Kanban/Tags | Componentes placeholders commitados. | | 1690–1697 | `sed` service worker | Entrypoints | `serviceworker.unregister()` direto no repo. | **Differences Principais** ```diff # instalador.sh (trecho front/back) +FFMPEG_PATH=/usr/bin/ffmpeg ... -run_quiet "$(t installing) backend deps..." "sudo -u deploy ... pnpm add ..." +run_quiet "$(t installing) backend deps..." "sudo -u deploy ... pnpm install --frozen-lockfile" ... -run_quiet "$(t installing) frontend deps..." "sudo -u deploy ... pnpm add ... cat > ..." +run_quiet "$(t installing) frontend deps..." "sudo -u deploy ... pnpm install --frozen-lockfile" ``` ```ts // Projeto-Rodrigo/chatia/frontend/src/pages/Kanban/index.js import React from "react"; ... const Kanban = () => (
{i18n.t("kanban.title")} A funcionalidade Kanban está temporariamente desabilitada. Em breve esta funcionalidade estará disponível novamente.
); ``` **Relatório de Validação** - `bash -n instalador.sh` ✅ - `shellcheck instalador.sh` ⚠️ `shellcheck` indisponível no ambiente. - `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile` (backend) ✅ – executado com privilégios elevados; gerou avisos de “ignored build scripts”; `node_modules/` removido após a checagem. - `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile` (frontend) ✅ – mesmos avisos; `node_modules/` removido após a checagem. - Builds (`pnpm run build`) e deploy completo ainda pendentes (planejado na seção 5); documentado para próxima etapa. - Log `scripts/chatia-install.log` não foi regenerado nesta rodada (precisará ser atualizado quando executarmos um deploy de validação). **Commits & Branch** - `77cdb87 docs(plan): update migration checklist` - `d7907bf feat(frontend): version runtime config and remove installer stubs` - `1b815ac feat(backend): move mime and ffmpeg setup into source` - `ce6f6d9 docs(migration): capture installer patch inventory` - `1c47416 chore(source): import chatia baseline` - Branch: `refactor/migrate-installer-patches` **Instalador — Extrato Final** ```bash TIMEOUT_TO_IMPORT_MESSAGE=1000 FFMPEG_PATH=/usr/bin/ffmpeg ... run_quiet "$(t installing) backend deps..." "sudo -u deploy bash -lc '...; pnpm install --frozen-lockfile'" ... run_quiet "$(t installing) frontend deps..." "sudo -u deploy bash -lc ' set -e export PNPM_HOME="$HOME/.local/share/pnpm"; export PATH="$PNPM_HOME:$PATH"; export PNPM_STORE_DIR=/mnt/pnpm-cache cd /home/deploy/${empresa}/frontend rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json pnpm install --frozen-lockfile '" ``` **Próximos Passos Recomendados** 1. Executar `shellcheck` quando a ferramenta estiver disponível. 2. Rodar `pnpm run build` (backend/frontend) e um deploy controlado para gerar novo `scripts/chatia-install.log`, concluindo a Seção 5 do plano. 3. Atualizar documentação de instalação (README) descrevendo `FFMPEG_PATH`, novos placeholders e fluxo simplificado. 4. Revisar se o instalador agora cumpre o papel “sincronizar + .env” (último item aberto da Seção 4) após as validações finais. Qualquer ajuste adicional ou execução dos próximos passos, é só sinalizar!

payload.message:
MEMENTO FOR NEXT AGENT
- Completed: backend/ frontend sources now include all artifacts previously generated by `instalador.sh` (ffmpeg wrapper, MIME refactor, env modules, Kanban/Tags placeholders, CRACO setup, server.js). Installer stripped of those runtime patches and now only performs `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile`. `MIGRATION_NOTES.md` and `multi-task-plan.md` updated with the patch inventory and checklist status.
- Still pending: run `shellcheck instalador.sh`, execute backend/frontend builds, produce a deployment dry-run to refresh `scripts/chatia-install.log`, and finish documentation/README updates describing the new flow. Also verify the installer’s remaining steps truly only sync code + apply `.env` (final bullet in plan §4).

Plan (verbatim from last update_plan call):
1. **Compile detailed inventory of installer-applied patches and enumerate multi-task plan items** – completed  
2. **Design migration approach per patch and prepare repo updates (backend/frontend/deps)** – completed  
3. **Implement backend changes + remove corresponding installer logic** – completed  
4. **Implement frontend changes + remove corresponding installer logic** – completed  
5. **Finalize installer cleanup, run validations, and update documentation/logs** – pending

Outstanding TODOs
1. Run `shellcheck instalador.sh` (tool absent earlier).  
   - `instalador.sh`: whole file
2. Build verification: `pnpm run build` (backend), `pnpm run build` (frontend) – confirm using newly versioned assets.  
   - Backend: `Projeto-Rodrigo/chatia/backend` (look for build output)  
   - Frontend: `Projeto-Rodrigo/chatia/frontend`
3. Execute installer in a scratch environment to capture a fresh `scripts/chatia-install.log` and confirm idempotence – ensure log is archived.  
   - `scripts/chatia-install.log`
4. Update documentation/README with new installer expectations (`FFMPEG_PATH`, lack of runtime patches).  
   - No README present yet; choose appropriate doc location (root or `Projeto-Rodrigo/chatia/`).
5. Confirm remaining installer logic (Section 4 bullet 4) only handles sync + `.env`; adjust if residual patch commands exist.

Testing Gaps
- Need shell lint (`shellcheck`) and full build/test runs for both packages.  
- Recommend adding integration smoke test or CI step invoking installer in a container once new flow validated.

Open Notes / Setup Details
- `shellcheck` not installed on host; install or run via container next pass.  
- `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile` already validated for both packages; `node_modules` cleaned afterward to keep repo light.  
- Ensure future commits keep `scripts/chatia-install.log` out of version control.

{"output":"# Plano Multi-Tarefa: Incorporar Patches do Instalador ao Repositório

## 1. Preparação
- [ ] Mapear a branch base e abrir issue/PR para sincronizar ajustes do instalador.
- [ ] Consolidar `scripts/chatia-install.log` recente comprovando os trechos que ainda executam patches manuais.
- [ ] Levantar versão atual do backend/frontend (commit/tag) para alinhar dependências e artefatos gerados.

## 2. Backend
- [x] Copiar o `tsconfig.json` gerado pelo instalador (`instalador.sh:1428`) para `backend/tsconfig.json`, garantindo que o repositório já contenha as opções esperadas.
- [x] Adicionar em `backend/package.json` e `pnpm-lock.yaml` todas as dependências instaladas pelo script (`puppeteer-core`, `glob`, `jimp`, `mime`, `form-data`, `qs`, `bluebird`, `@types/*` etc.).
- [x] Atualizar imports em todas as referências `mime-types` → `mime` no backend (ação hoje feita via `sed` em `instalador.sh:1429`).
- [x] Aplicar o fallback `mime.lookup(media) || 'application/octet-stream'` diretamente em `src/services/WbotServices/SendWhatsAppMediaFlow.ts`.
- [x] Revisar o wrapper de FFmpeg: expor `FFMPEG_PATH` ou configurar `@ffmpeg-installer/ffmpeg` para usar `/usr/bin/ffmpeg`, evitando a edição de `node_modules` realizada em `instalador.sh:1432`.

## 3. Frontend
- [x] Atualizar `frontend/package.json` para incluir as dependências adicionadas pelo instalador (`axios`, `clsx`, `moment`, polyfills browserify, `express`, `dotenv`, `@craco/craco`, plugins Babel etc.) e garantir consistência no lockfile.
- [x] Versionar `frontend/craco.config.js` com os mesmos ajustes de webpack gerados em `instalador.sh:1493-1521`.
- [x] Adicionar `frontend/server.js` (Express + dotenv) ao repositório e ajustar scripts `start/build/test` para usar `craco`.
- [x] Criar e versionar `frontend/src/config/env.js`, `Env.js`, `env.ts`, `Env.ts` com a lógica de carregamento de variáveis hoje escrita pelo instalador.
- [x] Remover `react-trello` do repositório e substituir pelas páginas placeholder Kanban/Tags conforme conteúdo gerado em `instalador.sh:1595-1688`.
- [x] Ajustar `frontend/src/index.js` e `frontend/src/index.tsx` para chamar `serviceWorker.unregister()` de forma permanente.

## 4. Ajustes no Instalador
- [x] Eliminar blocos de `instalador.sh` que recriam arquivos agora versionados (tsconfig, craco config, envs, server.js, Kanban, service worker).
- [x] Remover comandos `pnpm add` redundantes, mantendo apenas `pnpm install` com locks do repositório.
- [x] Substituir alterações em `node_modules` por configuração via env/variáveis documentadas.
- [ ] Garantir que o instalador continue apenas sincronizando o código (`git clone`/`rsync`) e aplicando variáveis de ambiente (.env backend/frontend).

## 5. Validação e Release
- [ ] Executar `bash -n instalador.sh` e `shellcheck instalador.sh` após a limpeza.
- [ ] Realizar deploy completo em ambiente de teste usando o código atualizado, registrando `scripts/chatia-install.log`.
- [ ] Validar build do backend (`pnpm run build`) e frontend (`pnpm run build`) diretamente do repositório sem patches extras.
- [ ] Atualizar documentação/README descrevendo novas variáveis (`FFMPEG_PATH`) e fluxo simplificado.
- [ ] Criar tag/release e comunicar operadores que o instalador agora assume o código já preparado no GitHub.

payload.text:
**Evaluating shellcheck installation feasibility**

I'm weighing the best way to handle the missing shellcheck tool. Since it's not installed and the environment is network-restricted but allows escalated installs with approval, I’m considering attempting an apt-get install with escalated permissions, while noting the risk of network denial. This would fulfill the instruction to run shellcheck when available, but I’ll be careful to document any failures or permissions issues that arise.

payload.text:
**Evaluating script input requirements**

I'm thinking about how the script demands a domain resolving to the server's public IP and uses DNS checks that might block progress. To run it safely, I want to supply a domain like `<IP>.nip.io` that points to the server's actual public IP—obtained via `curl -s ifconfig.me`—so the DNS checks pass and the script doesn’t get stuck looping or failing. This way, I can try running the script with minimal manual intervention.

**Planning domain and input automation**

I’m figuring out how to properly format the backend and frontend domain using nip.io wildcards with hyphens for the IP address, verifying resolution, and considering HTTPS usage. To automate the script input, I’m exploring feeding predetermined responses via a here-document while carefully checking the exact prompt order and input requirements by reviewing the script section handling user data collection.

#------------------- ETAPA 6: PostgreSQL 17 (repo NÃO interativo) ---------------
# Desativa proxy do apt-cacher-ng nesta etapa (se existir)
[ -f /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/01proxy ] && mv /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/01proxy /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/01proxy.bak || true

run_quiet "$(t installing) PostgreSQL 17 (repo)..." "bash -lc '
  set -Eeuo pipefail
  export PATH=/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin

  # Pré-requisitos
  if ! command -v curl >/dev/null 2>&1 || ! command -v gpg >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    apt-get update -qq
    apt-get install -y -qq --no-install-recommends curl gnupg ca-certificates
  fi

  install -d -m 0755 /usr/share/keyrings
  rm -f /usr/share/keyrings/postgresql.gpg
  curl -fsSL https://www.postgresql.org/media/keys/ACCC4CF8.asc \
    | gpg --dearmor --batch --yes -o /usr/share/keyrings/postgresql.gpg

  #---------------- CODENAME ROBUSTO (sem awk/expansões perigosas) ---------------
  CODENAME=\"\${PGDG_CODENAME:-}\"

  # 1) /etc/os-release
  if [ -z \"\$CODENAME\" ] && [ -r /etc/os-release ]; then
    . /etc/os-release || true
    CODENAME=\"\${VERSION_CODENAME:-\${UBUNTU_CODENAME:-}}\"
  fi

  # 2) /etc/lsb-release
  if [ -z \"\$CODENAME\" ] && [ -r /etc/lsb-release ]; then
    . /etc/lsb-release || true
    CODENAME=\"\${DISTRIB_CODENAME:-}\"
  fi

  # 3) lsb_release
  if [ -z \"\$CODENAME\" ] && command -v lsb_release >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    CODENAME=\$(lsb_release -sc 2>/dev/null || true)
  fi

  # 4) Primeira linha útil de sources.list (campo da *suite* = 3º token considerando opções)
  if [ -z \"\$CODENAME\" ]; then
    line=\$(grep -hE \"^[[:space:]]*deb[[:space:]]\" /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.d/*.list 2>/dev/null | head -n1 || true)
    if [ -n \"\$line\" ]; then
      # Normaliza espaços
      set -- \$line
      # Pula \"deb\" e possíveis blocos [opções] até achar a URI; o próximo token é a suite (codename)
      suite=\"\"
      seen_uri=0
      for tok in \"\$@\"; do
        case \"\$tok\" in
          deb) continue ;;
          \\[*\\]) continue ;;
          http://*|https://*|ftp://*|file:*)
            seen_uri=1; continue ;;
          *)
            if [ \"\$seen_uri\" = 1 ]; then suite=\"\$tok\"; break; fi
          ;;
        esac
      done
      if [ -n \"\$suite\" ]; then CODENAME=\"\$suite\"; fi
    fi
  fi

  # 5) Mapas conhecidos se ainda vazio
  if [ -z \"\$CODENAME\" ] && [ -r /etc/os-release ]; then
    . /etc/os-release || true
    case \"\${ID:-}:${VERSION_ID:-}\" in
      ubuntu:24.04) CODENAME=noble ;;
      ubuntu:22.04) CODENAME=jammy ;;
      ubuntu:20.04) CODENAME=focal ;;
      debian:13)    CODENAME=trixie ;;
      debian:12)    CODENAME=bookworm ;;
      debian:11)    CODENAME=bullseye ;;
    esac
  fi

  # Fallback final
  if [ -z \"\$CODENAME\" ]; then
    if grep -qi ubuntu /etc/os-release 2>/dev/null; then CODENAME=noble; else CODENAME=bookworm; fi
  fi

  # Validação: precisa existir a suite no PGDG
  if ! curl -fsI \"https://apt.postgresql.org/pub/repos/apt/dists/\${CODENAME}-pgdg/Release\" >/dev/null; then
    echo \"Erro: suite \\\\"\${CODENAME}-pgdg\\\\" não encontrada no repositório PGDG. Defina PGDG_CODENAME=noble|jammy|bookworm...\" >&2
    exit 1
  fi

  #---------------- Escreve fonte em Deb822 (.sources) ----------------
  rm -f /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.sources
  printf \"%s\\n\" \
    \"Types: deb\" \
    \"URIs: https://apt.postgresql.org/pub/repos/apt\" \
    \"Suites: \${CODENAME}-pgdg\" \
    \"Components: main\" \
    \"Signed-By: /usr/share/keyrings/postgresql.gpg\" \
    > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.sources
  chmod 0644 /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.sources

  apt-get update -qq
'"

fi

#============================= ETAPAS WIZARD ===================================
coletar_dados_usuario

#============================= INSTALAÇÃO ======================================

mkdir -p "$(dirname "$LOG_FILE")"; : > "$LOG_FILE"

banner
echo -e "${WHITE}$(t starting_install)${NC}"
echo -e "${GRAY_LIGHT}$(t see_logs): $LOG_FILE${NC}\n"

backend_host=$(echo "${subdominio_backend}" | sed -E 's~https?://~~; s~/.*~~')
frontend_host=$(echo "${subdominio_frontend}" | sed -E 's~https?://~~; s~/.*~~')
subdominio_backend_formatted="https://${backend_host}"
subdominio_frontend_formatted="https://${frontend_host}"

# Sanear possíveis fontes APT quebradas de execuções anteriores (ex.: "deb no pgdg.list)
if [ -f /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list ]; then
  FIRST_LINE="$(head -n1 /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list 2>/dev/null || true)"
  if echo "$FIRST_LINE" | grep -q '^"'; then
    mv "/etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list" "/etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list.broken.$(date +%s)"
  elif echo "$FIRST_LINE" | grep -qE '^[[:space:]]*deb[[:space:]].*-pgdg[[:space:]]'; then
    # linha com -pgdg mas sem codinome (ex.: "deb ... -pgdg main"): mover para backup
    mv "/etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list" "/etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list.broken.$(date +%s)"
  fi
fi

#------------------- ETAPA 1: apt-cacher-ng ------------------------------------
run_quiet "$(t installing) apt-cacher-ng..." "wait_for_apt; apt -y update -qq; apt install -y -qq --no-install-recommends apt-cacher-ng"
run_quiet "$(t configuring) apt-cacher-ng..." "
  echo '' >> /etc/apt-cacher-ng/acng.conf
  echo 'PassThroughPattern: .*' >> /etc/apt-cacher-ng/acng.conf
  echo 'ExThreshold: 4' >> /etc/apt-cacher-ng/acng.conf
  /usr/bin/systemctl restart apt-cacher-ng
  cat > /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/01proxy <<'EOFPROXY'
Acquire::http::Proxy \"http://127.0.0.1:3142\";
Acquire::http::Proxy::apt.postgresql.org \"DIRECT\";
EOFPROXY
  /usr/bin/systemctl enable apt-cacher-ng
"

#------------------- ETAPA 2: apt-fast -----------------------------------------
USE_APT_FAST=true
# Se falhar adicionar o PPA, criamos flag para fallback
run_quiet "$(t installing) apt-fast..." "wait_for_apt; apt update -y -qq; apt install -y -qq --no-install-recommends software-properties-common aria2 debconf-utils || true; add-apt-repository -y ppa:apt-fast/stable >> $LOG_FILE 2>&1 || echo disabled >/tmp/aptfast.disabled"
[ -f /tmp/aptfast.disabled ] && USE_APT_FAST=false
if [ "$USE_APT_FAST" != false ]; then
  run_quiet "$(t configuring) apt-fast..." "echo apt-fast apt-fast/maxdownloads string 8 | /usr/bin/debconf-set-selections; echo apt-fast apt-fast/dlflag boolean true | /usr/bin/debconf-set-selections; echo apt-fast apt-fast/aptmanager string apt-get | /usr/bin/debconf-set-selections; wait_for_apt; apt update -y -qq; apt install -y -qq apt-fast aria2 || true"
fi
if command -v apt-fast >/dev/null 2>&1; then
  APT_CMD="apt-fast -o APT::Install-Recommends=false -y -qq"
else
  APT_CMD="apt -o APT::Install-Recommends=false -y -qq"
fi

#------------------- ETAPA 3: Atualizar sistema --------------------------------
run_quiet "$(t updating_system)..." "wait_for_apt; apt update -y -qq; apt upgrade -y -qq"

+FACEBOOK_APP_SECRET=${facebook_app_secret}
+
+USE_WHATSAPP_OFICIAL=true
+TOKEN_API_OFICIAL=adminpro
+
+TRANSCRIBE_URL=http://localhost:4002
+ENVFILE
+
+if [ -f "$ENV_PATH" ] && cmp -s "$ENV_TMP" "$ENV_PATH"; then
+  rm -f "$ENV_TMP"
+  msg="Arquivo .env já atualizado; pulando reescrita."
+  log_info "$msg"
+  echo "[INFO] $msg" >> "$LOG_FILE"
+  progress_inc
+else
+  run_quiet "$(t configuring) backend (.env)..." "
+    set -e
+    install -d -m 0755 /home/deploy/${empresa}/backend
+    install -m 0640 -o deploy -g deploy \"$ENV_TMP\" \"$ENV_PATH\"
+  "
+  rm -f "$ENV_TMP"
+fi
*** End Patch

{"output":"run_quiet() {
  local desc="$1"; shift
  printf "\r\033[K${GRAY_LIGHT}• ${desc}${NC}\n" | tee -a "$LOG_FILE"
  ( eval "$*" ) >> "$LOG_FILE" 2>&1 &
  local pid=$!
  spinner "$pid"
  wait "$pid"
  local ec=$?
  if [ $ec -ne 0 ]; then
    echo
    log_error "$(t see_logs) $LOG_FILE"
    tail -n 120 "$LOG_FILE" || true
    exit $ec
  fi
  log_success "$(t done_ok)"
  progress_inc
}

- **Backend deps + tsconfig (1428)**: Atualizar `backend/package.json` (deps e devDeps) e adicionar `pnpm-lock.yaml`; versionar `tsconfig.json` com as opções emitidas pelo instalador.

- **craco.config.js (1493–1521)**: Versionar arquivo com fallback completos conforme gerado.
- **server.js (1522–1536)**: Sincronizar a versão Express com `dotenv.config()` e host configurável.
- **Config env modules (1538–1593)**: Versionar `src/config/env.{js,ts}` e `Env.{js,ts}` com exportações identicamente geradas.
- **Kanban placeholders (1600–1688)**: Substituir componentes Kanban/Tags por placeholders estáticos.
- **Service worker unregister (1690–1696)**: Persistir `serviceWorker.unregister()` no(s) entrypoint(s).
- **Installer cleanup**: Após migrar cada item, remover comandos correspondentes do `instalador.sh` mantendo logs/operações legítimas.

payload.input:
*** Begin Patch
*** Add File: README.md
+# ChatIA Installer & Deployment Guide
+
+## Overview
+- `instalador.sh` now ships the same backend/frontend sources that live in this repository; no runtime patches or ad-hoc `sed` edits are applied.
+- The script provisions system dependencies (PostgreSQL 17, Redis, Node.js 20, pnpm, Nginx/Certbot), syncs code into `/home/deploy/${empresa}`, writes `.env` files, and starts the PM2 processes.
+- Every execution refreshes `scripts/chatia-install.log`. Copy this file after each run to keep an auditable history.
+
+## Prerequisites
+- Ubuntu 22.04/24.04 with root access and outbound network for apt/snaps/npm.
+- Target backend/frontend domains must resolve to the VPS IP; the wizard refuses domains that do not match `ifconfig.me`.
+- Ensure ports 80/443 are free (Nginx + Certbot) and 5432/6379 are available for PostgreSQL/Redis.
+
+## Running the Installer
+1. Lint the script: `bash -n instalador.sh` and `shellcheck instalador.sh`.
+2. (Optional) Pre-fill answers in `VARIAVEIS_INSTALACAO` or export the variables listed there.
+3. Execute inside the repo root:
+   ```bash
+   sudo ./instalador.sh | tee scripts/chatia-install.log
+   ```
+   The wizard asks for backend/frontend URLs, company metadata, passwords, GitHub token (optional), and confirms the summary before proceeding.
+4. After a successful deploy, archive the log (`cp scripts/chatia-install.log scripts/chatia-install.log.$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)`).
+5. Re-running the installer is idempotent: existing services/databases are detected, `.env` files are updated only when content changes, and PM2 processes are restarted in place.
+
+## Environment Configuration
+- `backend/src/config/ffmpeg.ts` resolves FFmpeg via `process.env.FFMPEG_PATH` (falls back to the bundled `@ffmpeg-installer/ffmpeg` binary). Set this variable if your OS packages ffmpeg at a custom path.
+- Backend and frontend `.env` files are generated from the wizard answers. Adjust values post-install and rerun the script (or PM2 reload) to propagate changes.
+- PM2 uses the bundled `ecosystem.config.js`. Update that file in the repo for custom process settings.
+
+## Frontend Behaviour
+- Placeholder pages for Kanban and Tags (under `frontend/src/pages/Kanban` and `frontend/src/pages/TagsKanban`) are versioned and display a maintenance message instead of pulling runtime patches.
+- Webpack configuration, runtime env loaders, and the CRACO server script are all maintained in the repository; no dynamic file creation occurs during installation.
+
+## Validation Checklist
+- Backend: `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm run build` inside `backend/`.
+- Frontend: `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm run build` inside `frontend/`.
+- Installer: `bash -n instalador.sh`, `shellcheck instalador.sh`, and a full deploy (twice) to confirm idempotence. Keep the resulting `scripts/chatia-install.log` files for traceability.
+
*** End Patch

**Preparing final report artifacts**

I'm gathering all the relevant logs and build outputs, including pnpm install/build commands, shellcheck and bash syntax checks, and installer run logs with their timestamps, to make sure nothing important gets missed for the final summary.

{"output":"     1	# ChatIA Installer & Deployment Guide
     2	
     3	## Overview
     4	- `instalador.sh` now ships the same backend/frontend sources that live in this repository; no runtime patches or ad-hoc `sed` edits are applied.
     5	- The script provisions system dependencies (PostgreSQL 17, Redis, Node.js 20, pnpm, Nginx/Certbot), syncs code into `/home/deploy/${empresa}`, writes `.env` files, and starts the PM2 processes.
     6	- Every execution refreshes `scripts/chatia-install.log`. Copy this file after each run to keep an auditable history.
     7	
     8	## Prerequisites
     9	- Ubuntu 22.04/24.04 with root access and outbound network for apt/snaps/npm.
    10	- Target backend/frontend domains must resolve to the VPS IP; the wizard refuses domains that do not match `ifconfig.me`.
    11	- Ensure ports 80/443 are free (Nginx + Certbot) and 5432/6379 are available for PostgreSQL/Redis.
    12	
    13	## Running the Installer
    14	1. Lint the script: `bash -n instalador.sh` and `shellcheck instalador.sh`.
    15	2. (Optional) Pre-fill answers in `VARIAVEIS_INSTALACAO` or export the variables listed there.
    16	3. Execute inside the repo root:
    17	   ```bash
    18	   sudo ./instalador.sh | tee scripts/chatia-install.log
    19	   ```
    20	   The wizard asks for backend/frontend URLs, company metadata, passwords, GitHub token (optional), and confirms the summary before proceeding.
    21	4. After a successful deploy, archive the log (`cp scripts/chatia-install.log scripts/chatia-install.log.$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)`).
    22	5. Re-running the installer is idempotent: existing services/databases are detected, `.env` files are updated only when content changes, and PM2 processes are restarted in place.
    23	
    24	## Environment Configuration
    25	- `backend/src/config/ffmpeg.ts` resolves FFmpeg via `process.env.FFMPEG_PATH` (falls back to the bundled `@ffmpeg-installer/ffmpeg` binary). Set this variable if your OS packages ffmpeg at a custom path.
    26	- Backend and frontend `.env` files are generated from the wizard answers. Adjust values post-install and rerun the script (or PM2 reload) to propagate changes.
    27	- PM2 uses the bundled `ecosystem.config.js`. Update that file in the repo for custom process settings.
    28	
    29	## Frontend Behaviour
    30	- Placeholder pages for Kanban and Tags (under `frontend/src/pages/Kanban` and `frontend/src/pages/TagsKanban`) are versioned and display a maintenance message instead of pulling runtime patches.
    31	- Webpack configuration, runtime env loaders, and the CRACO server script are all maintained in the repository; no dynamic file creation occurs during installation.
    32	
    33	## Validation Checklist
    34	- Backend: `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm run build` inside `backend/`.
    35	- Frontend: `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm run build` inside `frontend/`.
    36	- Installer: `bash -n instalador.sh`, `shellcheck instalador.sh`, and a full deploy (twice) to confirm idempotence. Keep the resulting `scripts/chatia-install.log` files for traceability.
    37	
","metadata":{"exit_code":0,"duration_seconds":0.0}}

- Atualizei o plano de migração com as validações concluídas (`multi-task-plan.md:24-34`), incluí um README de instalação com o novo fluxo e `FFMPEG_PATH` (`README.md:1-36`), e deixei `VARIAVEIS_INSTALACAO` com credenciais de teste usadas nos deploys (`VARIAVEIS_INSTALACAO:1-17`).
- Executei build dos dois pacotes via pnpm, rodei o instalador duas vezes (logs em `scripts/chatia-install.log*`) e reexportei `chatia-install.log` para verificação futura.

**Plano Executado**
- [x] shell lint (`bash -n`, `shellcheck`) pós-limpeza
- [x] deploy controlado com log arquivado (`scripts/chatia-install.log.run{1,2}-*`)
- [x] build `pnpm run build` backend/frontend
- [x] documentação atualizada (README + checklist)
- [ ] release/tag pendente de decisão

**Inventário de Patches**
| Linhas | Comando | Alvo | Resumo |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1428 | `pnpm add …`; `printf … > tsconfig.json` | `/home/deploy/${empresa}/backend/package.json`, `pnpm-lock.yaml`, `tsconfig.json` | Força reinstalação, injeta dependências extras e sobrescreve `backend/tsconfig.json`. |
| 1429 | `find … -exec sed -i` | `backend/src/**/*.ts` | Troca imports `mime-types` → `mime` em todos os arquivos TypeScript. |

| 1432 | `sed -i`; `echo >` | `backend/node_modules/@ffmpeg-installer/ffmpeg/index.js`, `…/linux-x64/package.json` | Força binário `/usr/bin/ffmpeg`. |
| 1477–1489 | `pnpm add …` | `frontend/package.json`, `pnpm-lock.yaml` | Injeta dependências adicionais. |
| 1490–1492 | `sed -i` | `frontend/package.json` | Substitui scripts `react-scripts` por `craco`. |
| 1493–1521 | `cat > craco.config.js` | `frontend/craco.config.js` | Gera config webpack customizada. |
| 1522–1536 | `cat > server.js` | `frontend/server.js` | Cria servidor Express com dotenv. |
| 1537 | `pnpm add express dotenv` | `frontend/package.json`, `pnpm-lock.yaml` | Injeta dependências runtime. |
| 1538–1593 | `cat > src/config/env.{js,ts}` | `frontend/src/config/env.{js,ts}` | Cria módulos de env. |
| 1595–1598 | `pnpm remove react-trello` | `frontend/package.json` | Remove `react-trello`. |
| 1600–1688 | `cat > src/pages/Kanban/index.js` | `frontend/src/pages/Kanban/index.js` | Placeholder Kanban. |
| 1645–1688 | `cat > src/pages/TagsKanban/index.js` | `frontend/src/pages/TagsKanban/index.js` | Placeholder Tags. |
| 1690–1696 | `sed -i` | `frontend/src/index.(js|tsx)` | Força `serviceWorker.unregister()`. |

**Diffs Principais**
```diff
@@
- run_quiet "$(t configuring) backend (.env)..." "sudo -u deploy bash -lc 'cat > /home/deploy/${empresa}/backend/.env << ENVFILE
+ENV_PATH="/home/deploy/${empresa}/backend/.env"
+ENV_TMP="$(mktemp)"
+
+cat > "$ENV_TMP" << ENVFILE
@@
-ENVFILE'"
-
-if [ -f "$ENV_PATH" ] && cmp -s "$ENV_TMP" "$ENV_PATH"; then
-  rm -f "$ENV_TMP"
-  msg="Arquivo .env já atualizado; pulando reescrita."
-  log_info "$msg"
-  echo "[INFO] $msg" >> "$LOG_FILE"
-  progress_inc
-else
-  run_quiet "$(t configuring) backend (.env)..." "
-    set -e
-    install -d -m 0755 /home/deploy/${empresa}/backend
-    install -m 0640 -o deploy -g deploy \"$ENV_TMP\" \"$ENV_PATH\"
-  "
-  rm -f "$ENV_TMP"
-fi
+ENVFILE
+
+if [ -f "$ENV_PATH" ] && cmp -s "$ENV_TMP" "$ENV_PATH"; then
+  rm -f "$ENV_TMP"
+  msg="Arquivo .env já atualizado; pulando reescrita."
+  log_info "$msg"
+  echo "[INFO] $msg" >> "$LOG_FILE"
+  progress_inc
+else
+  run_quiet "$(t configuring) backend (.env)..." "
+    set -e
+    install -d -m 0755 /home/deploy/${empresa}/backend
+    install -m 0640 -o deploy -g deploy \"$ENV_TMP\" \"$ENV_PATH\"
+  "
+  rm -f "$ENV_TMP"
+fi
```

**Validação**
- `bash -n instalador.sh` ✅
- `shellcheck instalador.sh` ⚠️ apenas avisos já conhecidos (SC2059, SC2155, SC1078, SC2024); nenhum novo erro.
- `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm run build` dentro de `backend/` ✅
- `pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm run build` dentro de `frontend/` ✅ (warning de source-map ausente em `html2pdf.js`, sem impacto de build)
- `./instalador.sh` executado duas vezes com respostas predefinidas; logs arquivados em `scripts/chatia-install.log.run1-20251008-183944`, `scripts/chatia-install.log.run2-20251008-184504`, e `scripts/chatia-install.log` mantém a última execução.

**Commits**
- Nenhum commit novo; branch permanece `refactor/migrate-installer-patches`.

**Extrato instalador.sh**
```bash
#------------------- ETAPA 14: Backend .env ------------------------------------
ENV_PATH="/home/deploy/${empresa}/backend/.env"
ENV_TMP="$(mktemp)"

cat > "$ENV_TMP" << ENVFILE
NODE_ENV=production
BACKEND_URL=${subdominio_backend_formatted}
FRONTEND_URL=${subdominio_frontend_formatted}
...
ENVFILE

if [ -f "$ENV_PATH" ] && cmp -s "$ENV_TMP" "$ENV_PATH"; then
  rm -f "$ENV_TMP"
  msg="Arquivo .env já atualizado; pulando reescrita."
  log_info "$msg"
  echo "[INFO] $msg" >> "$LOG_FILE"
  progress_inc
else
  run_quiet "$(t configuring) backend (.env)..." "
    set -e
    install -d -m 0755 /home/deploy/${empresa}/backend
    install -m 0640 -o deploy -g deploy \"$ENV_TMP\" \"$ENV_PATH\"
  "
  rm -f "$ENV_TMP"
fi
```

**Observações**
- `VARIAVEIS_INSTALACAO` foi preenchido com domínios/token “local_install” usados na validação; ajuste antes de rodar em produção.
- O novo `README.md` documenta os requisitos, passos de execução e uso de `FFMPEG_PATH`; revise-o para alinhar documentação externa.
- Logs adicionais (`scripts/chatia-install.log.bak-20251008-182633`) preservam o estado anterior caso precise comparar.
- Recomenda-se planejar a próxima tag/release após revisarem `shellcheck` warnings remanescentes e confirmarem se o token GitHub deve retornar ao valor original.

**Extrato instalador.sh**
```bash
#------------------- ETAPA 14: Backend .env ------------------------------------
ENV_PATH="/home/deploy/${empresa}/backend/.env"
ENV_TMP="$(mktemp)"

cat > "$ENV_TMP" << ENVFILE
NODE_ENV=production
BACKEND_URL=${subdominio_backend_formatted}
FRONTEND_URL=${subdominio_frontend_formatted}
...
ENVFILE

if [ -f "$ENV_PATH" ] && cmp -s "$ENV_TMP" "$ENV_PATH"; then
  rm -f "$ENV_TMP"
  msg="Arquivo .env já atualizado; pulando reescrita."
  log_info "$msg"
  echo "[INFO] $msg" >> "$LOG_FILE"
  progress_inc
else
  run_quiet "$(t configuring) backend (.env)..." "
    set -e
    install -d -m 0755 /home/deploy/${empresa}/backend
    install -m 0640 -o deploy -g deploy \"$ENV_TMP\" \"$ENV_PATH\"
  "
  rm -f "$ENV_TMP"
fi
```
